articles.author: Lara Sanli, Jeff Stone, Lily Meier
articles.title: Victoria’s Secret (VSCO) Website Down in Dayslong Unexplained Outage - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Victoria’s Secret & Co. has stopped some office operations and told employees to avoid using company technology amid a “security incident” that also disrupted the retailer’s online shopping website and some store services.
articles.content: Victorias Secret & Co. has stopped some office operations and told employees to avoid using company technology amid a security incident that also disrupted the retailers online shopping website a… [+251 chars]

articles.author: Ryan Whitwam
articles.title: Samsung drops Android 16 beta for Galaxy S25 with more AI you probably don’t want - Ars Technica
articles.description: Samsung’s One UI 8 beta program for the Galaxy S25 is now open.

articles.author: Aisha Malik
articles.title: Google Photos debuts redesigned editor with new AI tools - TechCrunch
articles.description: The redesign adds new AI features, Reimagine and Auto Frame, which were previously only available on Pixel devices.
articles.content: Google is celebrating 10 years of Google Photos with the launch of a redesigned editor. The redesign adds new AI features, Reimagine and Auto Frame, which were previously only available on Pixel devi… [+1306 chars]
